name: Legend-Inscribed Woven Scroll
desc: A woven scroll that Citlali helped you complete. It chronicles the legendary battle you undertook to become a hero of Natlan.

value.name: Memories Flowing With Color
value.desc:
The Masters of the Night-Wind have upheld an ancient custom for generations- using colorful woven scrolls to record the history of Natlan. It is precisely because of this tradition that you, who have come to the tribe quite by chance, have been entrusted with a mission.

To fufill this mission, you realize that you must unravel a mystery that has gone unanswered for over two hundred years. The key to solving it seems to lie in a mysterious "color"...
